name: Taj Mahal
facts: Built by Shah Jahan in memory of his wife Mumtaz Mahal.
precautions: Do not touch or scratch marble surfaces.
Photography is restricted in certain areas.
Do not bring food or plastic inside the mausoleum.

name: Charminar
facts: Built by Muhammad Quli Qutb Shah, symbol of Hyderabad.
precautions: Avoid leaning or climbing on structures.
Do not stick posters or graffiti on walls.
